channel.title: Comments on: Siinamota’s Lost Album Therefore. Pre-sale and Release
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: By: Dorellymimi
item.dc:creator: Dorellymimi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/siinamotas-lost-album-therfor-pre-sale-and-release/#comment-28">The Noid</a>.
The writer was referring to the announcement, not the actual day he passed away, which was the 26th!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to The Noid.

The writer was referring to the announcement, not the actual day he passed away, which was the 26th!

item.title: By: The Noid
item.dc:creator: The Noid
item.description:
he passed away on July 23, 2015, not the 26th
